```{r table-appB-spawner-dat, echo=FALSE}
#dat.spawners defined in setup.Rmd
dat=dat.spawners
Yr1 = min(dat$Year)
Yr2 = max(dat$Year)

#naive model error
#def of MASE is MAE/naive error
NE=mean(abs(dat$spawners0-dat$spawners1))
```

```{r table-appB-spawner-precip, echo=FALSE}
#set up table
seltable = data.frame(
  Model=paste("base model (M) ", Yr1,"-", Yr2, " data", sep=""), 
  Residual.df="", 
  MASE="",
  Adj.R2="", 
  F="", 
  p.value="", 
  AIC="", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

#set up the cov0 and cov1 variables
covname="precip.gpcp.kerala.mon6to7."
dat$cov0=dat[[paste(covname, "0", sep="")]]
dat$cov1=dat[[paste(covname, "1", sep="")]]
m1 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m2 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + cov0, data=dat)
m3 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m4 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + cov1, data=dat)
m5 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + s(cov1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
a=anova(m1,m2,m3,m4,m5, test="F")

# header M1 for all models

#model 1
i=1; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="1. $ln(S_t)$ = $\\alpha$ + $s(ln(N_{t-1}))$ + $\\epsilon_t$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F="", p.value="", 
  AIC=round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

## Add space
tmp1 = data.frame(Model="\\kern 1em", Residual.df="\\kern 1em", MASE="\\kern 1em", Adj.R2="\\kern 1em", F="\\kern 1em", p.value="\\kern 1em", AIC="")
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

for(covname in c("precip.gpcp.kerala.mon6to7.", "precip.gpcp.kerala.mon4to5.")){
#set up table
  if(covname=="precip.gpcp.kerala.mon6to7.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Jun-Jul Precipitation (S1)"
  if(covname=="precip.gpcp.kerala.mon4to5.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Apr-May Precipitation (S2)"

#var header
seltable = rbind(seltable, data.frame(Model=covtit, Residual.df="", MASE="", Adj.R2="", F="", p.value="", AIC="", stringsAsFactors=FALSE))

#set up the cov0 and cov1 variables
dat$cov0=dat[[paste(covname, "0", sep="")]]
dat$cov1=dat[[paste(covname, "1", sep="")]]
m1 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m2 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + cov0, data=dat)
m3 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m4 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + cov1, data=dat)
m5 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + s(cov1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
a=anova(m1,m2,m3,m4,m5, test="F")

#model 2
i=2; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="2. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $\\beta V_t$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

#model 3
i=3; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="3. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $s(V_t)$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

# Comment out since S1 and S2 hyps do not involve prior year
# but rather exposure of fish to fishery
# #model 4
# i=4; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
# aa = summary(get(mod))
# tmp1=data.frame(
#   Model="4. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $s(V_t)$ + $\\beta V_{t-1}$",
#   Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1),
#   MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3),
#   Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3),
#   F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3),
#   AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
# seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)
# 
# #model 5
# i=5; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
# aa = summary(get(mod))
# tmp1=data.frame(
#   Model="5. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $s(V_t)$ + $s(V_{t-1})$",
#   Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1),

#   Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3),

#   AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
# seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

## Add space
tmp1 = data.frame(Model="\\kern 1em", Residual.df="\\kern 1em", MASE="\\kern 1em", Adj.R2="\\kern 1em", F="\\kern 1em", p.value="\\kern 1em", AIC="")
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)
}
# Remove space at bottom
seltable=seltable[1:(dim(seltable)[1]-1),]
```

```{r print-tableAppB-precip, echo=FALSE}
colnames(seltable)=c("Model", "Residual df", "MASE", "Adj.R2", "F", "p value", "AIC")
if(isLatex) colnames(seltable)=c("Model", "\\shortstack{Residual\\\\df}", "MASE", "\\shortstack{Adj.\\\\R2}", "F", "\\shortstack{p\\\\value}", "AIC")

thecap=paste("Model selection tests of GPCP precipitation as an explanatory variable for the catch $S_t$ during spawning months (Jul-Sep) using", Yr1, "to", Yr2,  "data.  The data range is determined by the years for which SST was available in order to use a consistent dataset across covariate tests.  The base model (M) with prior catch dependency was selected independently (Appendix A). To the base model, covariates are added. $V_t$ is the covariate in same calendar year as the Jul-Sep catch. The specific hypothesis (Table ", ref("tab:hypotheses"), ") being tested is noted in parentheses. The models are tested as nested sets.  Thus 1, 2a, 3a is a set and 1, 2b, 3b is another set. MASE is the mean absolute square error (residuals).")
fullcap=paste("Table ", ref("tabappB:spawner-model-precip", pre="B"), ". ", thecap, sep="")
kable(seltable, align="lcccccc", caption=fullcap, row.names=FALSE, escape=FALSE)
```

```{r table-appB-spawner-sst, echo=FALSE}
########### SST Hypotheses
#set up table
seltable = data.frame(
  Model=paste("base model (M) ", Yr1,"-", Yr2, " data", sep=""), 
  Residual.df="", 
  MASE="",
  Adj.R2="", 
  F="", 
  p.value="", 
  AIC="", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

#set up the cov0 and cov1 variables
covname="precip.gpcp.kerala.mon6to7."
dat$cov0=dat[[paste(covname, "0", sep="")]]
dat$cov1=dat[[paste(covname, "1", sep="")]]
m1 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m2 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + cov0, data=dat)
a=anova(m1,m2, test="F")

# header M1 for all models

#model 1
i=1; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="1. $ln(S_t)$ = $\\alpha$ + $s(ln(N_{t-1}))$ + $\\epsilon_t$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F="", p.value="", 
  AIC=round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

## Add space
tmp1 = data.frame(Model="\\kern 1em", Residual.df="\\kern 1em", MASE="\\kern 1em", Adj.R2="\\kern 1em", F="\\kern 1em", p.value="\\kern 1em", AIC="")
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

for(covname in c("SST.2.10.mon3to5.")){
#set up table
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon10to12.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Oct-Dec SST"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon7to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jul-Dec SST"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon1to3.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jan-Mar SST"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon7to9.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jul-Sep SST (S3)"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon6to9.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Ave Jun-Sep SST (S3)"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon1to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Ave Jan-Dec SST"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon9to10.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Ave Sep-Oct SST (L1)"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon1to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Ave Jan-Dec SST"
  if(covname=="SST.2.10.mon6to9.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Ave Jun-Sep SST (S1)"
  if(covname=="SST.2.10.mon9to10.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Sep-Oct SST (L1)"
  if(covname=="SST.2.10.mon1to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Ave Jan-Dec SST"
  if(covname=="SST.2.10.mon3to5.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Ave Mar-May SST (S4)"
  if(covname=="SST.2.10.mon7to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Ave Jul-Dec SST"

#var header
seltable = rbind(seltable, data.frame(Model=covtit, Residual.df="", MASE="", Adj.R2="", F="", p.value="", AIC="", stringsAsFactors=FALSE))

dat$cov0=dat[[paste(covname, "0", sep="")]]
dat$cov1=dat[[paste(covname, "1", sep="")]]
#dat$cov2=dat[[paste(covname, "2", sep="")]]
m1 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m2 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + cov0, data=dat)
m3 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m4 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + cov1, data=dat)
m5 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + s(cov1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
a=anova(m1,m2,m3,m4,m5, test="F")

#model 2
i=2; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="2a. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $\\beta V_t$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

#model 3
i=3; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="3a. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $s(V_t)$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

#model 4
i=4; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="4a. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $s(V_t)$ + $\beta V_{t-1}$", 
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

#model 5
i=5; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="4a. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $s(V_t)$ + $s(V_{t-1})$", 
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

m1 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m2 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + cov1, data=dat)
m3 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m4 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + s(cov1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
a=anova(m1,m2,m3,m4, test="F")

#model 4
i=2; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="2b. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $\\beta V_{t-1}$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

#model 5
i=3; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="3b. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $s(V_{t-1})$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)


## Add space
tmp1 = data.frame(Model="\\kern 1em", Residual.df="\\kern 1em", MASE="\\kern 1em", Adj.R2="\\kern 1em", F="\\kern 1em", p.value="\\kern 1em", AIC="")
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)
}

#set up table
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon10to12.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Oct-Dec SST"
```

```{r table-appB-spawner-upw, echo=FALSE}
## UPWELLING TEST
#set up table
seltable = data.frame(
  Model=paste("base model (M) ", Yr1,"-", Yr2, " data", sep=""), 
  Residual.df="", 
  MASE="",
  Adj.R2="", 
  F="", 
  p.value="", 
  AIC="", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

#set up the cov0 and cov1 variables
covname="precip.gpcp.kerala.mon6to7."
dat$cov0=dat[[paste(covname, "0", sep="")]]
dat$cov1=dat[[paste(covname, "1", sep="")]]
m1 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m2 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + cov0, data=dat)
a=anova(m1,m2, test="F")

# header M1 for all models

#model 1
i=1; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="1. $ln(S_t)$ = $\\alpha$ + $s(ln(N_{t-1}))$ + $\\epsilon_t$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F="", p.value="", 
  AIC=round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

## Add space
```

```{r print-tableAppB-upw, echo=FALSE}
thecap=paste("Model selection tests of upwelling intensity off Cochi as the explanatory variable.  See Table", ref("tabappB:spawner-model-precip", pre="B"), "for an explanation of the models. Two upwelling indices were tested. The nearshore-offshore temperature differential (UPW), which is the offshore (box 13) minus nearshore (box 4) SST, and the average nearshore SST along the Kerala coast (boxes 2-5). These are highly correlated but not identical. Larger (and positive) UPW indicates stronger upwelling (offshore warmer than nearshore) while smaller SST (during monsoon months) indicates stronger upwelling.")
fullcap=paste("Table ", ref("tabappB:spawner-model-upw", pre="B"), ". ", thecap, sep="")
```
